projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.subtitle: A modern, responsive portfolio showcasing my web development skills
overview: This portfolio website showcases my journey as a web developer and information systems student at NJIT.
Built with modern web technologies, it demonstrates my proficiency in front-end development and design.
features: Responsive design that works on all devices
Optimized performance and fast loading times

detailedContent.planning: I started with wireframes and mockups in Adobe XD, focusing on user experience and clean design principles. The goal was to create a portfolio that not only looks professional but also tells my story as a developer.
detailedContent.implementation: Built using Bootstrap 5 framework for responsiveness, with custom CSS for unique styling. Implemented smooth scrolling, hover effects, and optimized images for fast loading times.
detailedContent.challenges: Ensuring cross-browser compatibility was challenging, especially for older versions of Safari. I also had to optimize images without losing quality to maintain fast page load speeds.
detailedContent.results: Successfully deployed on GitHub Pages with excellent performance metrics. The site loads in under 2 seconds and has received positive feedback from peers and instructors.

projects.title: Task Manager Application
projects.subtitle: Efficient task tracking with modern UI/UX design
overview: A full-stack task management application built with the MERN stack.
Features real-time updates and collaborative task sharing capabilities.

detailedContent.planning: Researched existing task management tools like Trello and Asana to identify key features users need. Created user personas and user flow diagrams.
detailedContent.implementation: Used React hooks for state management and Express.js for RESTful API. Implemented JWT authentication and WebSocket for real-time updates.
detailedContent.challenges: Implementing real-time updates using WebSockets was challenging but rewarding. Had to handle connection drops and reconnection logic properly.
detailedContent.results: Deployed with high user satisfaction and positive feedback on usability. Successfully handles 100+ concurrent users.
